skills.name: RUIN
desc: • Deals true damage to a single target.
• Remove up to 2 Beneficial Effects if the target has Immunity.
• Damage increases based on your DEF and MAX HP.

skills.name: TACKLE
desc: • Deals true damage to a single target.
• Damage increases based on your MAX HP.

skills.name: BLOCK
desc: Takes the damage for any ally below 50% HP or any attack that would reduce an ally below 50% HP.
